features: WEIGHTLESS MOISTURIZER FOR ACNE-PRONE SKIN: Formulated to deliver moisture and hydration without adding oil or shine, CLEAR Oil-Free Moisturizer is an innovative night cream for blemish-prone skin. Finally, a non-greasy moisturizer for nighttime use.

OIL-FREE NIGHT MOISTURIZER: Infused with moisture barrier-repairing ceramides, pore-minimizing niacinamide, and antioxidant-rich blueberry & pumpkin extracts, this face moisturizer hydrates dry, flaky patches while visibly reducing redness - all without clogging pores.
Use Paula's Choice CLEAR Oil-Free Moisturizer once or twice daily as the last step in your skin care routine. For daytime use, always follow with SPF 30 or greater.

Paula's Choice products are made with YOUR SKIN in mind. Whatever your skincare concern, whether dryness, acne, fine lines, or sensitive skin; we've got a treatment line for you. The search for amazing skin care ends here. Finally, you found it.
Paula's Choice Skincare makes products that work. No fragrance, no parabens, no fluff. Just effective, science-backed formulas that target any concern from wrinkles to breakouts.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: STEP 1: Pore Normalizing Gel Cleanser STEP 2: Anti-Redness Exfoliating Solution STEP 3: Daily Skin Clearing Treatment with Benzoyl Peroxide STEP 4 AM: Ultra-Light Daily Hyrdating Fluid SPF 30+ STEP 4 PM: Oil-Free Moisturizer Two Week Trial Kit CLEAR Product Sizes 6 oz. 4 oz. 2.25 oz. 2 oz. 2 oz. 1 oz Cleanser, 1 oz Exfoliator & 0.5 oz Benzoyl Peroxide Treatment Available in Regular Strength and Extra Strength ✓ ✓ ✓ Key Ingredients 0.5% Salicylic Acid 2% Salicylic Acid Benzoyl Peroxide Avobenzone 2.0%, Octinoxate 7.50%, Octisalate 5.0%, Octocrylene 2.0% Licorice, Blueberry, Acai Extracts, Niacinamide Salicylic Acid, Benzoyl Peroxide Product Details A refreshing gel cleanser that sweeps away impurities and soothes redness. Gentle liquid exfoliant penetrates down into clogged pores for clearer skin. This lightweight lotion tackles the root causes of acne, while setting to a soft matte finish. A lightweight, oil-free sunscreen that provides vital protection & antioxidants and a shine-free finish. A sheer, ceramide-infused moisturizer that's the perfect last step in your nighttime anti-acne routine. A gentle, simple-to-use 3-step kit that fights acne and prevents future breakouts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this moisturizer, I bought it on Amazon because it is a little less expensive than on the Paula’s choice website and gets here a little bit sooner. This is a great moisturizer and works for me with acne prone, combination skin. Great quality and has no fragrance. The value for money and quality is good for me as it feels lightweight yet moisturizes well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My skin looks better
reviews.reviewText: It really helps keep my skin moisturized. I love how it is so soft and light

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my oily skin
reviews.reviewText: Very nice and quick absorbing. Did not leave my skin greasy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Here is a picture of what I use for my face which is both oily and dry. It has been hard finding the right face products for my skin. A lot of times it would clog my large pores, or I would have white heads along with dry/ red blotchy skin. Then I researched some of Paula’s Choice products. I picked out what I thought fit my type of skin. After some adjusting my skin has been the best it has ever been. I don’t have big blackheads, white heads, dry skin, or red blotches. And it feels great. In the morning I use the face wash, eye cream, and the daily hydrating fluid lotion. At night I use the face wash, the toner (make sure you let your face completely dry afterwards before moving on), I use 3 drops of the boost (let that dry), then I put on the night oil free moisturizer.Every Tuesday night I use the exfoliate instead of the toner. You let it dry completely. It takes about 15 minutes. I usually don’t put anything on after using the exfoliate because I am too tired to wait for it to dry. It works for me.Then about once a month or every two weeks on a Friday night, after using the toner, I use exfoliate rinse off treatment. Afterwards I finish with the boost and night moisturizer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I have combo skin and this isn’t very moisturizing *edited*
reviews.reviewText: The good thing about this moisturizer is that when you’re rubbing it in, it feels very luxurious. It’s a thicker formula and just feels so good to rub into your face. I’ve never really noticed a scent, so at the very least that could be a good thing to some people.However, my face will barely feel moisturized even right after I’m done rubbing it in, and within 10 minutes my face feels pretty dry. I have combination skin and hormonal acne so have been on the hunt for a night time moisturizer that works to keep me moisturized and keep breakouts at bay. Sadly, this one isn’t for me.EDIT: I've actually started to come around to this moisturizer LOL. I think I was using too little... lately I've been doing a sizable amount about the size of a penny, and that seems to make me feel much more moisturized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I was hoping for
reviews.reviewText: I am trying different Paula’s Choice products. I am 51 y/o and ordered this as I still have acne prone skin and this is oil free. I LOVE it! It absorbs instantly and is hydrating without being greasy at all! It is specified as a nighttime treatment but I have been using it during the day under my sunscreen and it is wonderful. Will continue to try more products in this skin care line.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Isn’t too harsh on my skin and absorbs fast leaving no residue. I have been struggling with breakouts and have had less lately after switching to some of these products
